name: The 5th Fisheries and Aquaculture Conference
content: The 5th Fisheries and Aquaculture Conference (FAC 2019) will be held from March 23 to 25, 2019 in Xi'an, China. This Conference will cover issues on Fisheries and Aquaculture. The aim of FAC 2019 is to provide a stage for researchers, engineers, academicians as well as industrial professionals from all over the world to present their latest research results and advanced research methods.
